# The Characters Build

***

## Lore contains:
* Main attribute _(stat bonuses)_
* Class _(Knight, Crusader, Necromancer)_
* Crewmates class _(for random creature generator)_
* 7 unique models _(basic, frozen, dead, skill1, skill2, skill3, skill4)_

### For special case, lore has
* A unique name _(for example, John Snow)_
* Attribute values _(STR, AGI, INT)_
* Level value _(for a boss fight)_

### Random creature generator is coming soon

<br />

## Autogenerated parameters from lore+given values:
* maxHP  _(maximum HP calculated from strength)_
* maxMP  _(maximum MP calculated from intelligence)_
* HP  _(current health points)_
* MP  _(current mana points)_

<br />

## Methods:
* Skill1
* Skill2
* Skill3
* Skill4
* Restore _(refill HP and MP)_
* Die _(change state to Dead)_

## States:
* Dead _(permanently can't perform anything)_
* Frozen _(can't perform anything for a fer rounds)_
* EVO1 _(2 active skills)_
* EVO2 _(3 active skills)_
* EVO3 _(4 active skills)_

<br />

***


<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
 
# Current Abilities [TASK]

| Ability  | Target    | Type            | Cost     | Description          |
|:--------:|:----------|:---------------:|:--------:|:--------------------:|
| Attack   | Enemy     | Momentum Damage | free     | Regular Attack       |
| Bash     | Enemy     | Momentum Damage | a bit MP | Stronger Attack      |
| Heal     | Self/Ally | Restore         | an ok MP | Partly restore HP    |
| Morale   | Ally Team | Buff            | a lot MP | Increase team damage |
| Frenzy   | Self      | Buff            | a lot MP | Super buffed stats   |
| Shackles | Enemy     | Debuff          | an ok MP | Freeze enemy         |
| Critical | Enemy     | Momentum Damage | a lot MP | Super damage         |

<br />
<br />

# Current Classes [TASK]

| Class       | Attribute    | 1st Ability | 2nd Ability | 3rd Ability | 4th Ability |
|:-----------:|:-------------|:-----------:|:-----------:|:-----------:|:-----------:|
| Knight      | Strength     | Attack      | Bash        | -           | -           |
| Crusader    | Strength     | Attack      | Heal        | Morale      | Frenzy      |
| Necromancer | Intelligence | Attack      | Summon      | Shackles    | Critical    |

| Assassin    | Agility      | Attack      | Bash        | Burn        | Critical    | Venomous Ult    | Shackles | Burn     |

| Politician  | Intelligence | -           | -           | -           | -           | -               | -        | -        |

# Maybe Perfect Future Abilities [just ideas]

| Ability  | Target    | Type                   | Cost     | Description                |
|:--------:|:----------|:----------------------:|:--------:|:--------------------------:|
| Attack   | Enemy     | Momentum Damage        | free     | Regular Attack             |
| Bash     | Enemy     | Momentum Damage        | a bit MP | Stronger Attack            |
| Heal     | Self/Ally | Restore                | an ok MP | Partly restore HP          |
| Morale   | Ally Team | Buff                   | a lot MP | Increase team damage       |
| Frenzy   | Self      | Buff                   | a lot MP | Super buffed stats         |
| Shackles | Enemy     | Debuff                 | an ok MP | Freeze enemy               |
| Critical | Enemy     | Momentum Damage        | a lot MP | Super damage               |
| Suck     | Enemy     | Momentum Damage + Heal | free     | Steals enemy's HP          |
| Burn     | Enemy     | Periodic Damage        | an ok MP | Burns/Poisons enemy        |
| Revive   | Ally      | Restore                | a lot MP | Complete revives dead ally |
